channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- S12700, S5700, S7700, S9700
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- S12700, S5700, S7700, S9700

item.title: CVE-2016-8785|2024-08-06T02:35:01.055Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- s12700%2C%20s5700%2C%20s7700%2C%20s9700
item.description: Huawei S12700 V200R007C00, V200R008C00, S5700 V200R007C00, S7700 V200R002C00, V200R005C00, V200R006C00, V200R007C00, V200R008C00, S9700 V200R007C00 have an input validation vulnerability. Due to the lack of input validation, an attacker may craft a malformed packet and send it to the device using VRP, causing the device to display additional memory data and possibly leading to sensitive information leakage.
